content: **knitted mittens in drops lima and drops kid-silk ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern li-162 yarn group b + a or c ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - m/l - l/xl circumference approx 17-18-19 cm length approx 24-25-26 cm **yarn** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100-100 g colour 6235 jeans blue and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25-25-25 g colour 08 light jeans blue **needles** drops double pointed needles size 4 mm **knitting gauge** 19 stitches in width and 25 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
